alert.note: Alert for Carson; Hutchinson; Moore; Potter (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 8:00AM CDT until June 23 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CARSON...SOUTHERN HUTCHINSON...NORTHEASTERN POTTER AND SOUTHEASTERN MOORE COUNTIES... At 800 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southeast of Sanford, or 5 miles west of Borger, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Hail may accumulate on roadways causing hazardous travel. Locations impacted include... Borger, Fritch, Stinnett, Sanford and Lake Meredith. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
